data.description:
Space Pirate Trainer DX is the official trainer for wannabe space pirates. 

Space Pirate Trainer puts you inside one of those awesome classic 80s arcade cabinets, where you’ll fight off relentless waves of droids with all the weapons and gadgets a Space Pirate would ever need. Pick up your blasters, tie up your sneakers and dance your way into the Space Pirate Trainer hall of fame!

The all-new DX version will put your skills to the test with kick-ass multiplayer modes. 

ARENA is a glimpse at the future of VR. Transform any indoor space into an incredible VR arena as you play a manic game of hide and seek with blasters. You’ll need to find a large open space, so start scouting for empty halls, tennis courts, and basketball courts!

VERSUS is an all-new multiplayer version of Space Pirate Trainer. Every time you shoot a droid, another one will appear targeting your opponent, ending in all-out blaster chaos!

changelog.change_log:
Bugs fixes:
*Playing Arena on headsets that had different OS languages is now fixed

This is our first big update since the launch of DX last month, we've had some amazing feedback from you all and really appreciate the support you've shown the game!

If you haven't already posted a review we'd really love to hear your thoughts on the new Versus and Arena modes. 

As a heads up - We've added a new versioning check for Arena, so make sure you update both headsets before playing.

Happy Space Pirate Training!

****************************
Versus Mode
- Droids you're supposed to aim for are now targeted with a triangle regardless of droid color. Accessibility FTW!
- Resolved a whole BUNCH of disconnection issues
- Lots of bug fixes & localization updates

Arena Mode
- You can choose how many lives you start with! Play one shot to kill, 3 shots, 5 or super size your games with 10 lives
- Rematch: Quick rematches are possible now, without having to go back to the Lobby
- Added a video to help guide players to setup the required maximum guardian
- 38 bug fixes, one of which might make your life better than you ever imagined? 
- We've officially localized in meters AND feet now. 10x10m vs 33x33ft, you're all winners
- Added a version check, so make sure you update both headsets before hitting the basketball court
Fixed score not updating in SOLO leaderboards
Fix loading issues for players on firmware V32
Added option to disable POSTFX on Quest 2 (recommended for 90Hz compatibility)

* General Performance update
* Fixed performance issues during Wave 34 (last stage of boss fight)

Localization (DE, FR, ES, JP, KO)
Added Demo Experience to the full game
Performance optimizations
